segments.text: I ’ d like to open a savings account . Can you tell me how to do it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , you have to fill out the form . And I let me see three identification cards or documents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have the driver ’ s license , a membership card and my passport . Would we do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see them . Yes . There ’ re ok .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ‘ s the minimum amount I can deposit in an account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can deposit and ensure amount of ten dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
